actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture by Unanimous Consent
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Agriculture by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act to extend eligibility for reimbursement for meal supplements for children in afterschool care, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to day care centers

summary.text: Amends the National School Lunch Act to extend eligibility for reimbursement for meal supplements for children in afterschool care.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act to extend eligibility for reimbursement for meal supplements for children in afterschool care, and for other purposes.
